member.name: T:MeshDecimator.Algorithms.FastQuadricMeshSimplification
member.summary: The fast quadric mesh simplification algorithm.

member.name: P:MeshDecimator.Algorithms.FastQuadricMeshSimplification.PreserveSeams
member.summary: Gets or sets if seams should be preserved. Default value: false

member.name: P:MeshDecimator.Algorithms.FastQuadricMeshSimplification.PreserveFoldovers
member.summary: Gets or sets if foldovers should be preserved. Default value: false

member.name: P:MeshDecimator.Algorithms.FastQuadricMeshSimplification.EnableSmartLink
member.summary: Gets or sets if a feature for smarter vertex linking should be enabled, reducing artifacts in the decimated result at the cost of a slightly more expensive initialization by treating vertices at the same position as the same vertex while separating the attributes. Default value: true

member.name: P:MeshDecimator.Algorithms.FastQuadricMeshSimplification.MaxIterationCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum iteration count. Higher number is more expensive but can bring you closer to your target quality. Sometimes a lower maximum count might be desired in order to lower the performance cost. Default value: 100

member.name: P:MeshDecimator.Algorithms.FastQuadricMeshSimplification.Agressiveness
member.summary: Gets or sets the agressiveness of this algorithm. Higher number equals higher quality, but more expensive to run. Default value: 7.0

member.name: P:MeshDecimator.Algorithms.FastQuadricMeshSimplification.VertexLinkDistanceSqr
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum squared distance between two vertices in order to link them. Note that this value is only used if EnableSmartLink is true. Default value: double.Epsilon

member.name: M:MeshDecimator.Algorithms.FastQuadricMeshSimplification.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new fast quadric mesh simplification algorithm.

member.name: M:MeshDecimator.Algorithms.FastQuadricMeshSimplification.Flipped(System.Numerics.Vector3@,System.Int32,System.Int32,MeshDecimator.Algorithms.FastQuadricMeshSimplification.Vertex@,System.Boolean[])
member.summary: Check if a triangle flips when this edge is removed

member.name: M:MeshDecimator.Algorithms.FastQuadricMeshSimplification.UpdateTriangles(System.Int32,System.Int32,MeshDecimator.Algorithms.FastQuadricMeshSimplification.Vertex@,MeshDecimator.Collections.ResizableArray{System.Boolean},System.Int32@)
member.summary: Update triangle connections and edge error after a edge is collapsed.

member.name: M:MeshDecimator.Algorithms.FastQuadricMeshSimplification.RemoveVertexPass(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Double,MeshDecimator.Collections.ResizableArray{System.Boolean},MeshDecimator.Collections.ResizableArray{System.Boolean},System.Int32@)
member.summary: Remove vertices and mark deleted triangles

member.name: M:MeshDecimator.Algorithms.FastQuadricMeshSimplification.UpdateMesh(System.Int32)
member.summary: Compact triangles, compute edge error and build reference list.

member.name: M:MeshDecimator.Algorithms.FastQuadricMeshSimplification.CompactMesh
member.summary: Finally compact mesh before exiting.

member.name: M:MeshDecimator.Algorithms.FastQuadricMeshSimplification.Initialize(MeshDecimator.Mesh)
member.summary: Initializes the algorithm with the original mesh.

member.name: M:MeshDecimator.Algorithms.FastQuadricMeshSimplification.DecimateMesh(System.Int32)
member.summary: Decimates the mesh.

member.name: M:MeshDecimator.Algorithms.FastQuadricMeshSimplification.DecimateMeshLossless
member.summary: Decimates the mesh without losing any quality.

member.name: M:MeshDecimator.Algorithms.FastQuadricMeshSimplification.ToMesh
member.summary: Returns the resulting mesh.

member.name: T:MeshDecimator.Algorithms.DecimationAlgorithm
member.summary: A decimation algorithm.

member.summary: A callback for decimation status reports.

member.name: P:MeshDecimator.Algorithms.DecimationAlgorithm.KeepBorders
member.summary: Gets or sets if borders should be kept. Default value: false

member.name: P:MeshDecimator.Algorithms.DecimationAlgorithm.PreserveBorders
member.summary: Gets or sets if borders should be preserved. Default value: false

member.name: P:MeshDecimator.Algorithms.DecimationAlgorithm.KeepLinkedVertices
member.summary: Gets or sets if linked vertices should be kept. Default value: false

member.name: P:MeshDecimator.Algorithms.DecimationAlgorithm.MaxVertexCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum vertex count. Set to zero for no limitation. Default value: 0 (no limitation)

member.name: P:MeshDecimator.Algorithms.DecimationAlgorithm.Verbose
member.summary: Gets or sets if verbose information should be printed in the console. Default value: false

member.summary: An event for status reports for this algorithm.
